content.question: Which of the following best explains the significance of the image in the context of United States society in the 1930s?

choices.label: The image shows the emergence of African American businesses as a response to racial segregation and exclusion.
The image showcases how Black newspapers provided spaces that gave Black women equal access to careers in response to gender inequality in society.
The image shows how Black organizations primarily focused on individual advancement rather than community empowerment in an effort to achieve uplift.
The image showcases increasing mainstream acceptance of African American occupations during a period of racial inequality.

content.answer: The image shows the emergence of African American businesses as a response to racial segregation and exclusion.

skill.text: 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's perspective, purpose, context, and audience.
